Name: Kill The Santa
About the game: Have you ever received an unwanted Christmas gift ? You will have a perfect opportunity to take revenge on drunk Santa's clones. Grab your weapon, choose the perfect spot and shoot as many as you can! Good Luck! 5 different spots to pick from and multiple different achievements to unlock! 8 Deadly Weapons to annihilate Santa's drunk clones! Use Powerups: Freeze and Slowmo Drinks How to Play: Choose one of the spot, Shoot Santas Get score Unlock new weapons buy powerups be the best ! Controls: Mouse LMB - fire RMB - Scope Mouse Scroll up/down - zoom 1 - slowmo 2 - freeze Space - skip camera tab - check spot status This game was not made to offend anyone's feelings or traditions. Kill the Santa was mainly designed and made to serve as a joke, we like Christmas and Santa, but we do not support the commercialization of this beautiful tradition and what it's become in the recent years. That's it. Happy Shooting! And Merry Christmas everyone.
